name: Beat Em Up 2 Jojo
description:
Controlls: Keyboard And Mouse:
  • Movement:
    • A-D
    • Left Arrow-Right Arrow
  • Direction:
    • Mouse Position
  • Jump:
    • W
    • Space
    • Up Arrow
  • Attack:
    • Left Click
    • Cntrl
  • Insert Coin:
    • Enter
  • Quit Game:
    • Escape
Gamepads:
  • Movement:
    • Left Stick
    • Left Arrow-Right Arrow
  • Direction:
    • Right Stick
  • Jump:
    • Left Stick Up
    • Up Arrow
    • X[Ps4 Controller]
    • A[X-box One Controller]
  • Attack:
    • Square[PS4 Controller]
    • X[X-box one Controller]
  • Insert Coin:
    • Start Button
  • Quit Game:
    • Select Button
A small personal  project made in an attempt to learn and practice around enums,delegates and events also it was a great chance to check the new unity input system.
